metadata.title: Tasty Delicious Beef Roast | Street Style Recipe | Irresistible Food, Marinated, Spicy hot, Masala
metadata.description: A beef roast is irresistible! Kerala-style beef roast made with marinated beef, spices, onions, tomatoes, and finished with lemon juice and vinegar.

en: [00:00:00.000] kerala style beef roast beef cooked with
[00:00:02.000] spices still tender and roasted in a mix
[00:00:05.000] of onions and tomatoes it's damn
[00:00:07.000] delicious let's make it i've taken stew
[00:00:09.000] cut beef adding all the spices chili
[00:00:11.000] powder turmeric coriander cumin fennel
[00:00:14.000] garam masala salt give it a good mix and
[00:00:17.000] let this marinate for fifteen to thirty minutes
[00:00:20.000] let's pressure cook the marinated beef
[00:00:21.000] i'm using my instant pot you can use
[00:00:23.000] a regular pressure cooker add some curry
[00:00:24.000] leaves some water pressure cook for twenty five
[00:00:27.000] minutes and after twenty five minutes here is the
[00:00:29.000] perfectly tender beef keep it aside
[00:00:32.000] for making this we have to use thinly
[00:00:33.000] sliced onions to a saucepan adding
[00:00:35.000] coconut oil dried bay leaves thinly
[00:00:37.000] sliced onions i have taken yellow onion
[00:00:39.000] seasoned with salt cook it for a few
[00:00:41.000] minutes and adding ginger garlic paste
[00:00:43.000] or grated ginger garlic some curry
[00:00:44.000] leaves green chilies cooked till the
[00:00:46.000] onions turn golden in color now let's
[00:00:48.000] add chopped tomatoes and cook till the
[00:00:50.000] tomatoes and onions have turned slightly
[00:00:52.000] brown so now it's time to add the
[00:00:54.000] pressure cooked beef along with the
[00:00:56.000] liquid we are going to cook this over
[00:00:58.000] high heat let all the liquid dry off
[00:01:00.000] it's going to take a few minutes the
[00:01:02.000] liquid is bubbling away and it's almost
[00:01:04.000] dried off so give it a good mix and stir
[00:01:06.000] fry let's add a tablespoon of freshly
[00:01:09.000] squeezed lemon juice stir fry over high
[00:01:12.000] season with salt and towards the end
[00:01:14.000] let's add a tablespoon of white vinegar
[00:01:16.000] stir fry over high heat till the beef
[00:01:18.000] turns slightly brown adding ground black
[00:01:20.000] pepper and that's it this is done let's
[00:01:23.000] serve in a bowl highly irresistible beef
[00:01:25.000] roast enjoy with parottas chapatis give
[00:01:28.000] it a try and thanks for watching
